title: Actor James Van Der Beek Dies from Cancer
summary: James Van Der Beek was a famous actor who starred in the TV show Dawson's Creek. He died at age 48 after being sick with bowel cancer. His family shared the sad news on social media, saying he was brave and peaceful. He found out he had cancer in 2023 but told everyone in 2024. He had six children and was in other shows and movies too. James talked about his symptoms, like changes in his bathroom habits, and got a test that showed he had stage three cancer. He felt very sad during treatment, losing parts of who he was, but learned he was still loved. After his diagnosis, he worked to teach people about getting checked for cancer early to help others. He was a big star in the late 1990s and 2000s.

background_read: James Van Der Beek was an actor who became famous for playing Dawson Leery on the TV show Dawson's Creek, which many people watched when they were teenagers. He also acted in movies like Varsity Blues. He had a family with six children. Bowel cancer is a type of sickness that can happen in the large intestine, and it's important to get checked by a doctor if you have symptoms like changes in bathroom habits. James shared his story to teach people about early detection, which means finding cancer soon so it can be treated better.
